element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm generates a new layer that indicates the time it takes the flow from each cell to reach the outlet of the basin defined by a given outlet point.

element.name: NETWORK
element.text: Channel network. If used, cells in the channel network will have a different flow speed that cells outside of it

element.name: RATIO
element.text: The ratio between the flow speed in channel cells and the one in cells not belonging to the channel network.

element.name: OUTLET
element.text: The outlet point of the watershed

element.name: TIME
element.text: The values in the cells of this output layer represent the time (in hours) that it takes the flow to reach the selected outlet point. The cells outside of the watershed have no data values.
